titleStmt.title: An answer to a book, intituled, The state of the Protestants in Ireland under the late King James government in which, their carriage towards him is justified, and the absolute necessity of their endeavouring to be free'd from his government, and of submitting to their present Majesties, is demonstrated.
titleStmt.author: Leslie, Charles, 1650-1722.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to Charles Leslie. cf. NUC pre-1956.
Table of contents: p. [2]-[7] at end.
